question: How many patients with Friedreich's ataxia were included in each cohort of the phase I/II double-blind, comparator-controlled trial of RT001.
ideal_answer: Each cohort of the phase I/II double-blind, comparator-controlled trial of RT001 involved 9 Friedreich's ataxia patients. In total nineteen patients enrolled in the trial, and 18 completed all safety and efficacy measurements.

snippets.text: We conducted a phase I/II double-blind, comparator-controlled trial with 2 doses of RT001 in Friedreich's ataxia patients (9 subjects each cohort)
Nineteen patients enrolled in the trial, and 18 completed all safety and efficacy measurements.
